articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Taegyong Laver Processing Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Taegyong Laver Processing Factory
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Pyongyang Taegyong Laver Processing Factory.
					 He was greeted by officials of the factory.
					
					 Noting that leader Kim Jong Il had paid special attention to the factory in his lifetime, Kim Jong Un said he came to take measures for increasing the output of laver and variety of its processed products.
					
					 Going round the factory, he acquainted himself in detail with the processing of laver. 
					
					 He learned about variety and quality of processed laver and about how to process it and expressed satisfaction over the fact that the factory has processed in various ways laver, health foodstuff widely used by the people in their diet.
					
					 To increase the production of laver and supply it to the people is one of the important works to improve their diet at an early date true to the lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said, advancing the tasks to be carried out by the factory.
					
					 He stressed that the factory should concentrate efforts on the work to raise the variety and output of processed laver since it is in high demand among the citizens.
					
					 In order to drastically increase the output at the factory, it is necessary to enhance the role of the relevant offshore farms, he said.
					
					 Aquaculture is an effective and profitable way for producing seafood in a large quantity, he said, adding that proper culture in uncontaminated shallow seas of the country would help make a big stride in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 He expressed expectation that officials and employees of the relevant section and the factory would make an innovation in production true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the WPK's policies.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Ri Jae Il, Jon Il Chun and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to Oldemiro Baloi, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique, on June 25 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Republic of Mozambique.
					 The message said that the two countries have consolidated and developed the bilateral relations on the principle of mutual respect for sovereignty, equality and reciprocity and boosted mutual support and cooperation in the international arena such as UN for the past four decades since the establishment of their diplomatic ties.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to the joint efforts of the two foreign ministries.
					
					 Believing that the cooperation undertakings in various fields would be successfully carried out, the message wished the minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation bigger successes in his work for the development of foreign relations of the country.

articles.title: Director of KPA General Political Bureau Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Director of KPA General Political Bureau Meets Lao Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Saturday had a talk with the Lao high-ranking military delegation led by Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. 
					 The Lao defence minister said: The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries forged and developed by President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il and Comrade Kaysone Phomvihane, the preceding great leaders of the DPRK and Laos, are favorably developing under the deep care of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He said the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in socialist construction are a fruition of the wise guidance of the great leaders of the Korean people. 
					
					 The Korean people are comrades-in-arms and brothers of the Lao people and Laos will always stand by the Korean people, he added.
					
					 Present there were Col. General No Kwang Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces and other generals of the KPA and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK Military Delegation and Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Military Delegation and Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Held
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Talks between the DPRK military delegation and the Lao high-ranking military delegation took place in Pyongyang on Saturday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Army General of the Korean People's Army Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Army Lieutenant General Ryom Chol Song, Army Lieutenant General Pang Kwan Bok and other generals and officers of the Korean People's Army and from the Lao side members of the Lao high-ranking military delegation led by Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of developing the friendly relations between the two armies and other issues of mutual concern. 
					
					 Earlier to the talks, a ceremony for welcoming the delegation took place.
					
					 Pak Yong Sik and Sengnouane Sayalat reviewed the guard of honor of the KPA Army, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Lao Defense Ministry
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Lao Defense Ministry
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the Lao Defense Ministry.
					 It was handed to Army General of the Korean People's Army Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Saturday by Minister of Defense Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party who is heading the Lao high-ranking military delegation.

articles.title: Reception Given for Lao High-ranking Military Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Lao High-ranking Military Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a reception on Saturday in honor of the visiting Lao high-ranking military delegation.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Present there were Army General of the Korean People's Army Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 Pak Yong Sik in a speech said that the visit marked a significant occasion in boosting the long-standing friendship, solidarity and cooperation between the armies and peoples of the two countries associated with devoted efforts of the preceding leaders.
					
					 We will consolidate and boost ties and cooperation with the fraternal Lao army, true to respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who is paying deep attention to the development of bilateral friendly relations, he noted.
					
					 Sengnouane Sayalat in a speech referred to the fact that armed forces organs of Laos and the DPRK discussed the cooperative relations between the armies of the two countries in a friendly and candid atmosphere and reached a consensus, thus contributing to the ceaseless development of friendly relations.
					
					 The visit of the high-ranking military delegation will contribute to boosting generation after generation the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the armies of the two countries provided by the great leader of the Korean people President Kim Il Sung and the respected leader of the Lao people Comrade Kaysone Phomvihane, he added.

articles.title: Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A Lao high-ranking military delegation led by Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Saturday. 
					 Being briefed on the President's revolutionary career and his family members at his old home in Mangyongdae, members of the delegation looked round historical relics.
					
					 They went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat made an entry in the visitor's book. He wrote that the Lao high-ranking military delegation deemed it honor to visit the old home of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the same day. 
					
					 Members of the delegation made a bow before the statue of the President waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid deep respects to the service personnel of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round some rooms of the museum.

articles.title: Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Lao High-ranking Military Delegation Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A performance was given on Saturday by the State Merited Chorus at the People's Theatre in honor of the high-ranking military delegation of Laos on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Among the audience on invitation were the delegation led by Minister of Defence Sengnouane Sayalat, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Phonekham Inthaboualy and his embassy officials. 
					
					 Also among the audience were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army Col. General No Kwang Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and service personnel of the KPA.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as male chorus "The Leader and the General Are Always Together", orchestral music and male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" and male quintet "Don't Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though One May Die." The performers truthfully represented the strong spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are advancing with great confidence toward the rosy future of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding eternal glory to the undying Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They also successfully presented world famous songs.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the high-ranking military delegation of Laos was conveyed to the performers, congratulating on their successful presentation.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses by S. Korean Puppet Group Disclosed
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses by S. Korean Puppet Group Disclosed
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released a white paper on Saturday to disclose the evermore serious human rights abuses of the puppet group.
					 South Korea is the world's worst grave yard of human rights, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 South Korea is now in the fascist dark era surpassing the period of "yusin" dictatorship and the infamous "Security Law" is in force, driving the whole society into extreme uneasiness and horror.
					
					 A mediaeval "witch hunt" is sweeping across south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean fascist regime is cracking down upon actions of people of various circles for the right to existence by labeling them "illegal" and showering poisonous tear liquid upon bereaved families of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and innocent inhabitants for demanding probe into truth of the disaster.
					
					 Serious youth unemployment in south Korea created a new-fangled phrase that university graduation leads to unemployment and young people abandon love, marriage, childbirth, dwelling houses and human relations. 
					
					 Women, children, the disabled and the elderly are forsaken by society. 
					
					 The right to existence of human being and security of lives are seriously violated in the south where extreme almighty-dollar principle and tendency of neglecting lives are prevalent. The number of people who opt for suicide being gloomy about their life is on the daily increase to reach more than 40 on a daily average, drawing jeer and derision as "kingdom of suicide".
					
					 To make matters worse, various kinds of large-scale disasters including the ferry Sewol disaster, roof collapse of the Kyongju Gymnasium in North Kyongsang Province and collision of electric cars in Seoul subway occurred one after another, claiming huge innocent lives.  
					
					 The white paper disclosed that south Korea is a colony of the U.S. imperialists beset with ceaseless human rights abuses. 
					
					 To name a few crimes, GIs gang-raped a south Korean woman in broad day and resorted to violence against the protesters and even policeman, beat a taxi driver with a lethal weapon for asking for taxi fare and made a shooting spree at south Koreans in the heart of Seoul. These hideous unethical crimes are taking place every day at the tacit connivance of the puppet forces and under their patronage.
					
					 Life security and right to existence of the south Korean people are under constant threat due to the U.S. imperialists' madcap war rehearsals against the DPRK.
					
					 The recent disclosure of the U.S. secret introduction of active anthrax germ into the Osan U.S. air force base and germ experiments conducted by it in other U.S. military bases in Kunsan and Phyongthaek sparked off towering resentment at home and abroad. 
					
					 The white paper denounced the puppet group for its hideous "human rights" racket against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet group is malignantly hurting the dignity and social system in the DPRK and becoming ever more undisguised in its "human rights" racket against the DPRK in a bid to realize its wild ambition for "unification of social systems."
					
					 The puppet chief executive is letting loose every day such invectives against the DPRK as "serious human rights issue" and "improvement of quality of life", escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet group sponsored in south Korea and overseas international meetings, seminars, hearings and photo exhibitions dealing with "human rights performance in the north" and hurled defectors to south Korea into such burlesques as making "testimonies" in a bid to paint a wrong picture of the human rights situation in the DPRK as part of smear campaign against it.
					
					 It disconnected south Korean netizens' access to the DPRK websites under such absurd pretext that "they are used as tools for propagating the social system in the north" and forcibly closed the websites introducing the eye-opening reality of the DPRK after labeling them "pro-north sites."
					
					 The above-said confrontation racket is stunning all Koreans and the whole world.
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet forces kick up their "human rights" racket against the DPRK, they can never play down the advantages of its social system admired by the world people, the white paper concluded.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Departs
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Departs
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Assembly of Vietnam led by Vice-Chairman Huynh Ngoc Son departed here for home on Saturday.
					 Earlier, the vice-chairman hosted a reception in honor of the visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Meetings of Voters Held to Nominate Candidates for Deputies to Local Assemblies
articles.content:
Meetings of Voters Held to Nominate Candidates for Deputies to Local Assemblies
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings of voters for nominating candidates for deputies to provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies and examining their qualifications took place in the DPRK.
					 Reports were made at the meetings.
					
					 Explained at the meetings was the Law on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels.
					
					 Nominated there were officials, workers, farmers and intellectuals as candidates for deputies to the above-said people's assemblies.
					
					 The participants heard speeches on the qualifications of the candidates for deputies.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued stamps (one sheet and one individual) introducing the starting point of the country's road and its Supreme Court.
					 Contained in the sheet are a stamp showing the starting point of DPRK's road at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang, a Korean map and a marker of the road starting point, which stands at the center of the square platform where portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are displayed.
					
					 The individual stamp features the Supreme Court of the DPRK and its emblem.

articles.title: Yonbaek Peasant Dance of Korea
articles.content:
Yonbaek Peasant Dance of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Peasant dance, one of the Korean folk dances which have the longest history, is still popular in Yonan, Paechon, Chongdan and other counties of South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
					 Typical of it is Yonbaek peasant dance, which was listed as one of national intangible heritages.
					
					 In this regard, Dr. Kim Son Yong, a researcher of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 The dance features agricultural working life of the Korean people ranging from sowing to harvesting with local music performed with national percussion and wind instruments like gong, hourglass drum and bamboo flute.
					
					 What is most conspicuous in the Yonbaek peasant dance is a dance turning round decorative tassels.
					
					 The peasant dance is well-known over the world for vividly showing the optimistic life of the Korean nation. The Yonbaek peasant dance in particular has been one of items at the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".
					
					 The peasant dance has been steadily developed through national contests.

articles.title: Papers Term S. Korean Prosecution's Announcement of Results of Interim Investigation Political Fraud
articles.content:
Papers Term S. Korean Prosecution's Announcement of Results of Interim Investigation Political Fraud
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet prosecution made public results of interim investigation into the Song Wan Jong case.
					 The prosecution authorities indicted only officials not belonging to the Park camp Hong Jun Phyo, governor of South Kyongsang Province, and Ri Wan Gu, former "prime minister" who had no excuse for denying his scandal as evidence proving his crimes was brought to light out of 8 corrupt politicians disclosed by Song. They ruled that 6 others including the former and incumbent presidential chiefs of staff who are pro-Park elements and core confidants of the chief executive were freed from any charges.
					
					 Commenting on this, DPRK's leading newspapers Saturday say the above-said judgment is a base political fraud to help the present south Korean conservative regime cover up its crimes and tide over its ruling crisis.
					
					 The case of Song Wan Jong is an unprecedented power-backed scandal in which the leading confidants of the chief executive were all involved, says Rodong Sinmun, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet prosecution is busy playing down the case and putting under carpet the truth behind it, reading the face of Chongwadae.
					
					 South Korean media are criticizing and ridiculing the above-said prosecution's investigation, saying "pro-Park human body" has disappeared while there remains "only the tail not inclined to Park."
					
					 The present chief executive has been proud of her "morality" and "upright" politics. But the above-said case clearly proved that the assertion about her "moral and upright personality" is no more than hypocrisy.
					
					 Minju Joson says with no sleight of hand can the puppet group cover up the hideous scandal and political fraud and evade stern judgment by the people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges EU to Think Twice over Increased Arms Sale to S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges EU to Think Twice over Increased Arms Sale to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Air Bus has scaled up its arms sale to south Korea.
					 It has recently decided to sell four air tankers to south Korea in the wake of its recent decision to sell hundreds of attack helicopters to the latter.
					
					 What matters is that air tanker A330 MRTT is capable of operating not only with the U.S. air force but also with NATO forces in contingency and its operational sphere covers the whole Korean peninsula, some areas of China and Russia and even the South Sea of China.
					
					 The decision on the introduction of the air tankers would reportedly bring about an inevitable change in the Korean peninsula-centered "operation conception" maintained by the south Korean puppet air force.
					
					 EU countries, whenever an opportunity presented itself, expressed deep concern over tense situation on the Korean peninsula. The action taken by Air Bus, however, is an extremely base act of adding fuel to increasing tension and a dangerous one of disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 Arms sale is not just a commercial lever.
					
					 Strategic arms sale to dispute-torn regions in the world, notably the Korean peninsula, has become a major lever for the U.S. and its followers to execute their foreign policy for aggression, dominate other countries and interfere in their internal affairs.
					
					 As a matter of fact, Northeast Asia including the Korean peninsula has turned into the most dangerous hotspot due to Washington's hostile policy and policy of massive arms sale against the DPRK.
					
					 Not content with turning the whole of south Korea into an arms market and exhibition ground awash with U.S.-made weapons, the U.S. has ceaselessly shipped its latest lethal weapons to south Korea.
					
					 South Korea has been reduced to the world's biggest nuclear outpost, hotbed of nuclear war and exhibition and test ground for new type weapons.
					
					 A nuclear war may break out any moment on the Korean peninsula with the highest density in the deployment of nuclear weapons, where latest weapons are being introduced in an unbroken chain.
					
					 The present situation on the peninsula, which has turned into the world's biggest hotspot due to Washington's high-handed and arbitrary practices, requires all countries more urgently than ever before to think twice over any act of harassing peace and stability in the region.
					
					 Nevertheless, EU countries are mulling selling four air tankers to south Korea, a grave war crime pursuant to the U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 EU countries have often pretended to make a great contribution to global peace and stability, trumpeting about "defence of peace", and are now zealously cooperating with the U.S. aggression policy. This is hypocrisy towards the world community and perfidy to peace.
					
					 Does this behavior bring any benefit to EU members?
					
					 They had better bear in mind that it will be necessary for their own good to refrain from such acts as escalating tension but pursue a policy helpful to ensuring peace and stability.
					
					 Strategic arms sale is a main factor of disturbing regional peace and security.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Hostile Forces' Reckless Remarks about Pyongyang Bio-engineering Institute
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Hostile Forces' Reckless Remarks about Pyongyang Bio-engineering Institute
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Riff-raffs of the U.S. who claim to be experts on north Korean affairs and senior researchers in a recent meet-the press pulled up the Pyongyang Bio-engineering Institute.
					 They talked rubbish that its facilities are "similar to those for producing anthrax germs", "processes for producing agrochemicals are similar to those for producing anthrax germs" and "the institute hints the north is capable of producing anthrax germs."
					
					 On July 10 YTN, KBS and other reptile conservative media of south Korea echoed their assertions, jabbering "there is some sense" in a bid to escalate the anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 This is no more than a foolish attempt of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to divert to the DPRK the world protest and criticism of the U.S. which introduced live anthrax germs into its military base in south Korea and conducted experiments for applying them into an actual war and the south Korean puppet regime which connived at them.
					
					 The U.S. tops the world list of biological weapons and anthrax germs and it is the world's worst criminal state stooping to any means and methods to use them. It has more than 400 companies specializing in developing biological weapons.
					
					 The U.S. defined the Korean peninsula as the most dangerous region in the germ warfare to measure the killing rate of anthrax germs. Since 1998 the U.S. set up institutes and related facilities in its military bases in Osan, Ryongsan and Phyongthaek of south Korea before any other U.S. forces bases in the world to conduct anthrax germ experiments.
					
					 In May this year it introduced into south Korea the anthrax germs called "devil's weapon" whose fatality rate reaching 95 percent, the highest of biological weapons. This is the most hideous scenario to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 Due to the U.S. south Korea turned into a testing ground of all biological weapons such as anthrax germs and arsenal of deadly weapons.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, chiefly to blame for the production, stockpiling and proliferation of biological weapons. It is, at the same time, an empire of evils which does not bother to exterminate other nations and states in utter disregard of international law and world public opinion in order to realize its ambition for aggression.
					
					  The American murderers and their servants south Korean puppet authorities' false propaganda about the Pyongyang Bio-technical Institute is absolutely intolerable as it is the height of trick against the DPRK. 
					
					 Refuting the U.S. accusation against the Pyongyang institute, the commentary queries are a lot of bases for producing agrochemicals in the U.S. and various other parts of the world the facilities for producing anthrax germs? 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are under-wits suffering from mental derangement as they take the facilities for the production of agrochemicals for anthrax germ production base. 
					
					 We declare once again that Korean scientists developed bio-chemicals in the 21st century highly efficacious for agricultural production, animal husbandry, fruit farming, gardening and horticulture and not harmful to human bodies, soil and ecological environment through Juche-oriented scientific pursuits. 
					
					 The DPRK acquired the technology which was monopolized by a few developed countries as evidenced by the establishment of the system for industrially producing bio-chemicals on a high sterilized, dust-free and unmanned basis. This is a signal success for all Koreans in the north and the south to be proud of in the world and national treasure. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities, cat's paws of the U.S., vilify the Pyongyang institute as "anthrax germ production base". They are the most despicable traitors and human scum without equals in the world. 
					
					 The story of "the base for producing anthrax germ" floated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities is part of their propaganda about "threat of biological weapons" from the north. 
					
					 The U.S. sets the biological weapons warfare and anthrax germ warfare as main military operations for a new war on the Korean peninsula and has pushed ahead with them for several decades. On the other hand, it cooked up the story of "threat of biological weapons" and story of "anthrax germ base" and the south Korean authorities connive at this crime. They should not be let go scot-free. 
					
					 With no vitriol can the U.S. and the south Korean authorities tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Demands Authorities Make Reparation
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Demands Authorities Make Reparation
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Supreme Court ruled on July 9 that the authorities should make reparation for bereaved families as regards the puppet army and police's killing of civilians on Jeju Island early in the June 25 Korean war, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 After the outbreak of the war by traitor Syngman Rhee, the puppet army and police on Jeju Island brutally killed hundreds of islanders who were preliminarily arrested only in South Jeju County till August according to the list premeditatedly worked out under the pretext of those suspects of the April 3 uprising.
					
					 In 2007 the south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation defined the killing as an illegal massacre by the authorities and, afterwards, the bereaved families filed a suit against the authorities for reparation.
					
					 The court authorities admitted the illegality of the massacre and ruled the "government" should make reparation.

articles.title: South Korean Paper Urges Dictatorial Regime to Step Down
articles.content:
South Korean Paper Urges Dictatorial Regime to Step Down
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on Thursday demanded the coup regime and dictatorial regime step down. 
					 The editorial referred to the resignation of the floor leader of the "Saenuri Party" who promoted the discussion on the "draft amendment to the National Assembly law" on Wednesday. 
					
					 The editorial went on:
					
					 It is not the first time that the chief executive ousted her undesirable guys.
					
					 This is not the time when the chief executive could stay in presidency till her death like Park Chung-Hee no matter how desperately she abuses her power.
					
					 Her tyranny will only bring the end of the dictatorial regime, the editorial concluded.

articles.title: Koreans in China Meet to Remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Koreans in China Meet to Remember Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Koreans in China held a meeting at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on July 8, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid high tribute to them.
					
					 They went round photos dealing with the undying revolutionary careers and feats of the Generalissimos and those showing the daily developing DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Paek Kyong Hyon, chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, Korean citizens residing in Beijing and other Koreans in China.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Liaoning Regional Association laid a floral basket at the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan held a memorial service at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on July 8, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, its vice-chairman, the editor-in-chief of the paper Thongil, heads of compatriots art troupes and other Koreans there.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together at the embassy before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said the noble personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man is always remembered by the overseas compatriots. His great idea and immortal exploits will be remembered by overseas compatriots and world progressives forever, Ju added.
					
					  The participants watched videos and looked round photos dealing with the revolutionary career of the President.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung by Cambodian King and Great Queen
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung by Cambodian King and Great Queen
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk of Cambodia sent huge floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on July 6 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The floral baskets were placed before portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Bangladesh, Benin and Germany from July 1 to 5 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and other speakers praised the President for making great contributions to the Korean revolution and accomplishment of the global cause of independence, adding that he is alive in the hearts of the progressives for his exploits.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" said that the President founded the Juche idea and thus clearly indicated the road to be followed by humankind.
					
					 The chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany said that the President's works serve as textbooks and must books for the world communist and workers' parties as they indicate the road for struggle.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place by the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran and an Ethiopian enterprise on July 2 and 6 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the President was a prominent leader of the Korean people and elder statesman recognized by the world who devoted his all to the country's prosperity, people's happiness and national reunification to the last moments of his life.
					
					 The second secretary of the said city committee noted that though 21 years had passed since the President passed away, the Korean people are looking back upon his noble revolutionary career with boundless yearning as he devoted his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised the President as the greatest man who made a fresh history for the development of the friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK and made immortal contributions to the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Bangladesh Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Bangladesh Political Figure
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed invincible commander who started revolutionary struggle in his early years, founded the immortal Juche idea and defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and a peerlessly great man who dedicated himself to independent and peaceful reunification of the country, development of the socialist movement and victorious advance of the human cause of independence.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said this in a statement on July 6 to observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and other peoples in the world, on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of his demise, Garib Newaz said in the statement:
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of independence pioneered by him were successfully carried forward and developed by leader Kim Jong Il who pursued the Songun politics and are now dynamically advancing toward the final victory under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Tajik Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Tajik Political Figure
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, released a statement on July 7 to observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Il Sung, a great man highly praised by the progressives, performed undying exploits for not only the Korean revolution but also the world revolution, the chairman noted, adding:
					
					 He founded the unique man-centered Juche idea for the first time in the history of human thought and thoroughly applied it to the revolution and construction.
					
					 Based on the Juche idea, he led the Korean revolution along the road of victory and illuminated the road to be taken by mankind.
					
					 Socialist Korea built by him is a beacon of hope for the progressives in the world. 
					
					 The undying exploits performed by him and leader Kim Jong Il will shine for all ages.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Brazil, Ecuador
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Brazil, Ecuador
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Ecuadorian bodies and organs posted articles illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on their websites on July 1 and 4 to observe the 21st anniversary of his demise.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in an article said the President performed undying exploits on behalf of the times and history, holding aloft the banner of independence. The article noted:
					
					 Under his guidance the Korean People's Revolutionary Army defeated Japanese imperialism and liberated the country.
					
					 After the liberation he led the Korean people to step up the building of a new country by their own efforts in conformity with its specific conditions.
					
					 He also led the Fatherland Liberation War against the aggression by the U.S. imperialists to a victory with his Juche-based strategies and tactics and war methods.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to accomplish the global cause of independence all his life.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article said the tender-hearted image of the President will be cherished by all peoples for all ages.
					
					 Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador in articles praised the President for performing exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Guinean, Thai Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Guinean, Thai Personages
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Guinean and Thai personages released statements on July 6 to observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, paid the highest homage to the President who dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and global independence. The chairman said:
					
					 The Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President is the ideological and theoretical wealth common to mankind.
					
					 He rendered positive support to peoples of many countries in their struggle for national liberation in colonies and building of new society. He performed undying exploits for developing the non-aligned movement.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is boundlessly revered by all peoples as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also other progressives.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Syrian, Egyptian Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Syrian, Egyptian Papers
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Egyptian papers carried articles to observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Syrian paper Al Thawrah in an article on July 5 noted that Kim Il Sung was a great man recognized by the world who made tangible contributions to carving out the destiny of mankind. The article went on:
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea after embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens.
					
					 He defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country by beating back the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their allies against the young DPRK.
					
					 He shared joy and sorrow with the people and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 He also made great contributions to the global cause of independence.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on July 4 in an article titled "Eternal sun" said that Kim Il Sung, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, dedicated himself to them. The article noted:
					
					 He took care of all people with his great magnanimity.
					
					 He rendered sincere support to many countries and nations in their struggle for national liberation in colonies and building of new society.
					
					 His idea and cause will be immortal like the sun.
					
					 He is the eternal sun of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its bulletin on July 3.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Procesamiento de Alga Taegyong de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Procesamiento de Alga Taegyong de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Procesamiento de Alga Taegyong de Pyongyang.
					Le acogieron en el terreno los funcionarios de la fabrica.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prestaba atencion especial a esta fabrica y el mismo vino para tomar medidas para aumentar la produccion y las variedades de los articulos procesados de alga.
					
					Recorriendo la fabrica, averiguo en detalles el estado de procesamiento de alga.
					
					El Mariscal estudio detalladamente sobre la variedad, calidad y metodo de elaboracion de los articulos procesados de alga y expreso la alegria de que en la fabrica se procesa con varios metodos el alga, comida saludable muy conocido por nuestro pueblo.
					
					Producir mucha alga y suministrarla a la poblacion constituyen un trabajo importante para mejorar cuanto antes la vida alimentaria del pueblo en acato al espiritu de vida de los grandes Lideres, dijo y presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que la fabrica debe tomar como linea principal la labor para aumentar la variedad y la cantidad de produccion de los articulos procesados de alga, conforme a la alta demanda del pueblo.
					
					Para aumentar notablemente la cantidad de produccion, hay que elevar decisivamente el papel de la empresa de cultivo maritimo de la rama relacionada, ordeno.
					
					El cultivo maritimo es el metodo efectivo y util de produccion de productos maritimos en recoger muchas algas marinas y peces, dijo y continuo que solo con buen cultivo en el mar no contaminado de nuestro pais podemos resolver gran problema en la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la rama interesada y de la Fabrica de Procesamiento de Alga Taegyong de Pyongyang registraran innovaciones en la produccion en acato a los legados de los grandes Lideres y las politicas del Partido.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Ri Jae Il, Jon Il Chun y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones militares de Corea y Laos
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones militares de Corea y Laos
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 11 en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones militares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					 Estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y otros generales y oficiales del EPC, y por la laosiana, los miembros de la delegacion militar de alto rango presidida por el secretario del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y ministro de Defensa, Sengnouane Sayalat, y el embajador lao en Corea, Phonekham Inthaboualy.
					
					 En las conversaciones, se intercambiaron las opiniones de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad entre los ejercitos de ambos paises y los problemas de interes mutuo. 
					
					Con anticipacion, tuvo lugar la ceremonia para dar bienvenida a la delegacion militar de alto nivel de Laos.
					
					Sengnouane Sayalat, junto con Pak Yong Sik, paso revista a la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publica carta blanca
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publica carta blanca
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publico una carta blanca revelando la situacion de crimenes de lesa humanidad cada vez mas atroces de los titeres surcoreanos.
					La nota pone al desnudo que el Sur de Corea es el infierno de DDHH de pesima calana en el mundo y continua:
					
					Ahora, en el Sur de Corea se resucita la epoca tenebrosa fascista que supera el periodo de la dictadura de "renovacion" y la infame "ley de seguridad" lleva toda la sociedad a la gran inquietud y pavor.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas perpetran la represion  medieval contra todas las personas incluyendo los habitantes surcoreanos, los compatriotas en ultramar y extranjeros si escriben articulos o cantan las canciones o salpican octavillas que no les son de agrado. 
					
					Oprimen la lucha de los surcoreanos por el derecho a vivir calificandola de actividad ilegal y lanzan el toxico liquido lacrimogeno a los familiares de las victimas del accidente del barco "Sewol" y otros habitantes que demandaban la  averiguacion de la verdad del caso.
					
					En el Sur de Corea circula una palabra de moda, segun la cual la graduacion de la universidad es precisamente el desempleo, y muchos jovenes dejan de amar, casarse, parir, preparar la casa y tener relaciones humanas, he aqui la gravedad del problema de desempleo de los jovenes.
					
					Tambien, las mujeres, los ninos, los discapacitados y los ancianos son repudiados por la sociedad.
					
					En el Sur de Corea se violan gravemente el derecho de existencia y la seguridad de vida, llega a mas de 40 el numero promedio de suicidas. Asi que el Sur de Corea es burlado y censurado como "reino mundial de suicidio".
					
					Ocurren unos tras otros el hundimiento tragico del ferry "Sewol", el derrumbe de techo del edificio de Coliseo de Kyongju, el incidente de choque de tren electrico en el metro de Seul y otros incidentes escandalosos, dejando muchos muertos.
					
					En estos dias, se extiende MERS a toda la extension surcoreana, dejando a mas de 180 contagiados, 36 muertos y mas de 15 mil aislados, debido a lo cual el Sur de Corea esta  acorralado al pavor, inquietud y estancamiento.
					
					El Sur de Corea es una sociedad colonial convertida en la escena caotica de lesa humanidad del imperio yanqui.
					
					 Los uniformados norteamericanos violaron en colectivo a plena luz del dia a una mujer surcoreana, golpearon a los habitantes y hasta los policias que les reprochaban por el caso. E incluso blanden armas mortiferas a los choferes que les demandan el dinero por taxi, disparan sin piedad a los habitantes en el lugar centrico de Seul. Pero los gobernantes titeres toleran y amparan tales crimenes antipopulares.
					
					 Los entrenamientos de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU., que se desarrollan cada dia, amenazan siempre la seguridad de vida y el derecho a vivir de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					  Recientemente, fue revelado el hecho de que EE.UU. introdujo en secreto los vivos bacilos de antracosis en la base de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas en Osan del Sur de Corea y cometio la experimentacion de guerra bacteriologica en varias bases de las tropas yanquis radicadas en Kunsan, Phyongthaek y otras, los cuales causan gran indignacion del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					  Con la concertacion del humillante "tratado de libre comercio" con EE.UU. y la apertura del mercado al imperio, la banda del Sur de Corea profundizo mas la dependencia colonial proyanqui de su economia y vendio sin vacilacion hasta el derecho a vivir de la poblacion.
					
					  Ahora los titeres surcoreanos se entregan a la vil campana anti-RPDC difamando nuestra dignidad y regimen con el objetivo de lograr la ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					  Para este fin, siguen soltando los disparates tales como "gravedad de DDHH" y "mejora de calidad de vida" de alguien para incitar la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Organizan en el interior y exterior del pais la reunion internacional, seminario, audiencia, fotogaleria, etc. relativos al inexistente "problema de DDHH del Norte" y presentan como "testigos" a las escorias humanas huidas al Sur de Corea para tergiversar y damnificar la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC.
					
					  Impusieron a los habitantes a no tener acceso a las paginas Web de la RPDC y cancelaron los sitios Web de Internet que presentan nuestra asombrosa realidad tras calificarlos de "sitios pro-norte" insistiendo en que estos "se usan como aparato de propaganda del regimen del Norte".
					
					  De veras, tales actos conflictivos de los titeres surcoreanos consternan a todos los connacionales y todo el mundo.
					
					  Pero, por mas que se entreguen a la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, los titeres surcoreanos no podran deshonrar la superioridad de nuestro regimen socialista que admira a todo el mundo.

articles.title: Reuniones de votantes para recomendar a candidatos a diputados y evaluar sus calificaciones
articles.content:
Reuniones de votantes para recomendar a candidatos a diputados y evaluar sus calificaciones
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se realizan las reuniones de los votantes para recomendar a los candidatos a los diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (los municipios) y los distritos y evaluar sus calificaciones.
					 En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los electores de las circunscripciones correspondientes.
					
					  Hubo el informe y la explicacion sobre la ley de las elecciones de diputados a las asambleas populares a todos niveles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Fueron recomendados los funcionarios, los obreros, los campesinos y los intelectuales como candidatos a los diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (los municipios) y los distritos.
					
					  En las reuniones hubo los discursos para evaluar las calificaciones de los candidatos.

articles.title: ACNC refuta sofisterias ofensivas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC refuta sofisterias ofensivas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, un "especialista en los asuntos de Corea" y otros tipejos de Estados Unidos soltaron en una "charla con prensa" unas sofisterias acusando el Instituto de Biotecnologia de Pyongyang.
					En la ocasion, ellos dijeron que el "Instituto es igual a las instalaciones de los bacilos de antracosis", "son iguales los procesos de la produccion de fertilizante y de los bacilos de antracosis" y "es una insinuacion de que tambien el Norte de Corea podria producir los bacilos de antracosis".
					
					El dia 10, "YTN", "KBS" y otros medios de prensa conservadores venales del Sur de Corea lo transmitieron diciendo que "hay algo de razon" y recrudeciendo mas los  alborotos intrigantes anti-RPDC.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser un intento absurdo de EE.UU. que introdujo en su base militar en el Sur de Corea los vivos bacilos de antracosis y realizo un experimento para aplicarlos en la guerra real y de la banda titere surcoreana que lo amparo activamente, a fin de dirigir a la RPDC la flecha de la protesta y la condena del mundo contra ellos.
					
					EE.UU. produce y posee mayores armas biologicas y bacilos de antracosis en el mundo y es mayor pais asesino y delincuente que los usa sin consideracion alguna. Actualmente llega a mas de 400 el numero de las companias que se dedican al desarrollo de las armas biologicas.
					
					Para estimar la mortalidad de los bacilos de antracosis, EE.UU. definio la Peninsula Coreana como primera zona peligrosisima de la guerra bacteriologica y desde el 1998, instalo por primera vez en las bases militares norteamericanas en Osan, Ryongsan y Phyongthaek del Sur de Corea el instituto y otras instalaciones interesadas y vino realizando experimentos.
					
					En mayo pasado, introdujo en el suelo surcoreano los bacilos de antracosis, llamados como "arma diabolica", cuya mortalidad llega a 95%, cometiendo asi un crimen antietico encaminado a exterminar la nacion coreana.
					
					Debido a las maniobras de EE.UU., el Sur de Corea se ha  convertido en un lugar de experimento de las diversas armas biologicas y el deposito de las armas mortiferas.
					
					De veras, EE.UU. es el verdadero criminal de la produccion, posesion y proliferacion de las armas biologicas, las de exterminio masivo y es imperio de males que para alcanzar su ambicion agresiva, no vacila en cometer las maniobras para exterminar a otras naciones y otros estados sin tomar en consideracion las leyes internacionales y la opinion publica del mundo.
					
					La divulgacion de ese rumor por parte norteamericana y surcoreana deviene el climax de la conspiracion anti-RPDC.
					
					Esta vez, el imperio cuestiono el susodicho instituto insistiendo en que esto podria ser una "base de produccion de bacilos de antracosis" porque son iguales los procesos productivos de ese bacilo y los insecticidas.
					
					Segun la teoria del imperio, las numerosas bases de produccion de fertilizantes instaladas en todos los rincones  del mundo deben ser las bases productoras de arma mortifera, bacilo de antracosis.
					
					Son los imbeciles con trastornos psiquicos, Estados Unidos y los compinches titeres que consideran la instalacion de  produccion de insecticidas como base productora de bacilo de antracosis.
					
					Volvemos a aclarar que nuestros cientificos han inventando con el autoctono metodo de investigacion cientifica el bio-insecticida del siglo 21 de gran eficiencia necesario apremiantemente en la agricultura, la ganaderia, la fruticultura, la floricultura y la selvicultura y no influencia al cuerpo humano, la tierra y el medioambiente.
					
					Lograron en el nivel elevado la esterilizacion sin polvos y la absoluta automatizacion para producir de manera industrial el insecticida y establecieron otras tecnicas productivas  monopolizadas solo por algunos paises desarrollados del mundo, lo cual es el resultado y el patrimonio nacional dignos de enorgullecer a todo el mundo.
					
					Son sirvientes a grandes potencias, traidores a la nacion sin precedentes y escorias humanas los titeres surcoreanos que acusan la base productora de insecticida de su connacional de base productora de bacilos de antracosis obedeciendo a su amo gringo.
					
					El rumor que se difunde por el imperio y los titeres surcoreanos es la continuacion y ampliacion de su anterior teoria sobre "amenaza de armas biologicas" del Norte.
					
					Nunca seran tolerados los crimenes de EE.UU., que para la nueva guerra coreana determino la guerra biologica como una de las operaciones militares principales y lo promueve durante decenios, mientras invento el rumor de la "amenaza de armas biologicas" y la "base de bacilo de antracosis", y los  compinches titeres surcoreanos que lo amparan activamente.
					
					Con cualesquier palabrerias, el imperio y la banda titere surcoreana nunca podran manchar la digna imagen de la RPDC.
